uuwa palath sabha mathiwaranaya sandaha nama yojana bhara ganima ikuth 6 wanida awasan wana wita badulla disthrikkaya sandaha deshapalana paksha 10 k ha swadhina kandayam 4 kda monaragala disthrikkaya sandaha deshapalana paksha 12 k ha swadhina kandayam 7 kda nama yojana bharadi thibini.nama yojana bhara dun deshapalana paksha athurin pradhanama deshapalana paksha lesa eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya ha eksath jathika pakshaya tharaga karana athara sesu paksha siyallanta adu tharamin ek manthri dhurayak ho himikara ganime padanamin tharaga karana paksha we.eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya niyojanaya karamin uuwa palathata hitapu pradhana amathyawarun dedenaku tharaga karana athara hitapu kabinat amathyawariyaka men ma hitapu niyojya amathyawarayek da tharaga karanu labayi.

piyumi waha asuwaya."mata mathaka na ara ispirithale kolawala thiyenne mage nama neweyine' "mawa oya dennage nidahasata badawak neweyi nam mama innan.minissu inna thana wadakari kiwwata kamak nahae.eeka kokatath hondayi" winitha iwatha balagena kiwaya."oya dennath oyalage pawul jiwitheta mawa badawak karaganna epa.man mage paduwe puluwan udawuwak karagena innan" "kohomatath oyadennata lagadima lamayi bala ganna kawuruhari ooniweyine" "dan ma lamayi hadaganna thaththi kamathi na" piyumi bima balagena kiwaya."oogollanta upades denna mata ayithiyak na.eeth bandata passe oowa thawath parakku karanna honda na.
